about_webmaker_login.message: At Webmaker, weâ€™re tired of forgotten and weak passwords, so we made this new experience. If you prefer, you can set a password from your profile page.

key_expiry_message.message: If you did not try to sign in, you can ignore this message. If you prefer, you can set a password to use for sign in. Questions? View our help article or email help@webmaker.org.
